attributes.action: Force Nigel Farage to repay all of his MEP wages, as he did not earn them.
attributes.additional_details: When he first assumed his role as MEP in 1999, he made his intentions for the UK's place in the EU clear. With this, he took little interest and made little attempt at his duties as MEP. Despite this, he has claimed millions in wages and expenses.
attributes.background: Nigel Farage has siphoned millions of out the EU's budget, despite making little to no effort to fulfil his role.
